r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.1M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Amtech Aeronautical. The average
  contract duration was 2.8 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $584.6K. The longest
  contract was 6.12 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.2M.
lookup_name: 'AMTECH AERONAUTICAL'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.1M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '15'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '7%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '-38%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '-47.2K'
s424_mean_duration: '2.8'
s421_mean_contract_value: '584.6K'
s425_max_duration: '6.12'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.2M'
